posts.message:
للناس اللى إشتغلت Xamarin أو PhoneGap  مين فيهم أحسن؟
و مين ال Quality بتاعة الـ App فى الأخر بتبقى أحسن؟
و PhoneGap بيحتاج MacOS أو iOS عشان تــ Develop بيه iOS Apps ولا عادى؟
و تنصحوا أشتغل بمني فيهم أحسن!

posts.caption: phoronix.com
posts.description: Phoronix is the leading technology website for Linux hardware reviews, open-source news, Linux benchmarks, open-source benchmarks, and computer hardware tests.

This is a valuable opportunity to gain knowledge and experience in the area of Embedded Systems specially in Internet of Things (IOT).

Volunteering offers many benefits... Here are some reasons to be volunteer:
- Advance your career, develop new skills, network with your peers
- Become a SharePoint super user
- Develop new skills in a learning environment
- Be part of a professional community
- Meet and work with a diverse group of people
- Receive personal rewards and a sense of achievement
- Practice your technical and leadership skills
- Exposure to new and exciting career opportunities

If you are a geek in "Embedded Software" or "Embedded Hardware" or "Wireless Networks" or "Android Mobile Application" kindly send your CV to (info@openwarelab.com)

posts.message:
For those unfamiliar with spring and who don't get what I mean when I say Spring has it all. A few times I see people confusing C# and the .NET Framework comparing it to just plain Java language with it's base libraries. What would make more sense is understanding that each of these languages runs on an entire platform, which can talk to each other and inter-operate.  

So for those who would like to experience for themselves I share this list if guides.

http://spring.io/guides

I recommend with building a restful web service. All the tools, all the libraries and even the IDE is absolutely free and all of it is less that 800 MB :)
posts.caption: spring.io
posts.description: these guides are designed to get you productive as quickly as possible and using the latest Spring project releases and techniques as recommended by the Spring team

posts.caption: dzone.com
posts.description: It turns out that the encryption used by WhatsApp is built on elliptic curves. They can be a little complicated to explain but this article contains excellent information about it.

posts.message:
عندي مشكلة فى ubuntu 14 
قفلت اللاب وفتحته لقيته مش حاسس بال keyboard ولا الماوس 
مش عارفه اعمل ايه .. هل فيه حل ولا هضطر انى اشيل نسخة الابونتو وانزلها من تاني

This is some kind of Greatness..
If i were them i will sell it for $$$$ :)
But really they surprised me when i found it... FULL FREE!
Appreciating this effort...

posts.description: Software Architecture and Design teaches the principles and concepts involved in the analysis and design of large software systems.
